txt.en: The Orcs hide bomb caches in the area between Ashmargathâl and Târ-kútoz.\n\nLúka has requested that you safely destroy any caches you find.

'While you were gone, I discovered that the bombs' alchemical mixture uses bat droppings. The Orcs of Târ-kútoz have bats under their command... perhaps Thraunákh is closer than we thought.

'For now, however -- the Orcs hide caches of bombs in the unclaimed territory to the west, between Ashmargathâl and Târ-kútoz. There are already scouts out looking for the caches. I tried to join them, but they told me to stay back here and rest....

'Could you go in my stead? I trust that you're keen of eye and steady of hand. Dismantle and destroy any caches you come across.'
With the sapper-bomb's alchemical formula broken, it's time to destroy the Orcs' bomb caches.
You have scoured the area and destroyed all the bomb caches you could find.\n\nYou should return to Ashmargathâl and give Lúka the update.

'Look, Hermáth! Mekhnet has returned to us! She said she's ready to be back on the field, but I told her she needed some rest first. She had to make her way up to us, after all!\n\n'Yes, I know I was supposed to be resting too, but I couldn't! I didn't want to see anyone get hurt again, and my anxiety kept me alert. But now... I can rest easier knowing the Orcs won't have as many bombs on-hand.'
